title: Cliffside Club Med Sicily All-Inclusive Luxury with Five Bars & Restaurants & Spa
description:
Carved into a cliffside above the turquoise waters of Cefalù Bay, this luxurious resort combines the natural beauty of Sicily with effortless indulgence. Spend the morning practising stand-up paddleboard yoga or sailing from the private beach, then lounge by the Zen Natural Pool - a freshwater oasis reserved exclusively for adults.

Dining here is an event in itself, from grilled seafood at beachfront La Riva to Nebrodi pork chops at the baroque-inspired Il Palazzo. After dinner, sip Sicilian wines under the stars before retreating to your elegant room or villa, each with sun-drenched terraces and a relaxed, contemporary feel.

Escape into botanical serenity at the Club Med Spa by Sothys and sink into a steamy sauna, or while away the hours poolside with a drink in hand. Beyond the resort, explore Sicily's rugged coastline, olive-dotted hills and richly storied towns.
offer_address: Localita Santa Lucia, Cefalù 90015, Sicily-Palermo, Italy
